modName: T71's Personal Follower plus Underwear Mania (Male)
summary: A bunch of well placed hairy men followers, their Alter-Ego & Beefy version  and a chest waiting for your come. (Soon a complete description and images).
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72261?][img]http://s13.postimg.org/7m3wkgy8n/Solo_Titolo.png[/img]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72145/?]V2.0 standalone follower extruded and tweaked from this mod.[/url]

----------------------------------
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72145/?][img]http://s8.postimg.org/y6k21gset/Titolo.png[/img]
V2.0 standalone follower extruded and tweaked from this mod.

[/url]----------------------------------
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72024?][img]http://s23.postimg.org/sfukan5jf/Devil_Link.png[/img]
V2.0 standalone follower extruded and tweaked from this mod.
[/url]


       [youtube]RzFAzXm7Vi0[/youtube]


--------------------

[img]http://s12.postimg.org/c2109zvcd/Immagine1.jpg[/img][/center]
[font=Trebuchet MS]
[center][size=5]Introduction:[/size]
[font=Trebuchet MS]Seven well placed hairy & tattooed men followers,
able to summon their Alter-Ego version during battles,
one leader able to conjure their extra pumped [font=Trebuchet MS]version[/font][/font]
 brought toghether by a common destiny,
Now meet at whiterun. Many years have passed since their first battle.
Some of them have come for personal glory other have come for
fight those they love but all will do their best to be victorious
in this adventure which will decide their fortune.
[font=Trebuchet MS][/font]Now they awaiting you in Whiterun to take a place
in your army of fighters against the evil forces.[/center]

In this rekease the followers outfits [font=Trebuchet MS] (as other things)[/font] are not been included as wearable items for player.
If you want something of that be available to wear for your character let me know and I will include ot in the next update.

This mod add 25 new NPC in Whiterun in this way:

7+1 Main Followers
7+1 (Only summonable) Alter-Ego version of main followers*
7 (Only summonable) Beefy version of main followers*
2 Expo Models (can become followers by EFF or similar) for Underwear Mania
15 Spells for summoning Smooth, Alter-Ego and Beefy version followers.

from Version 2.10
+2 followers: Angel & Devil
+a bunch of new spells

from Version 3.00
+5 followers: The Butcher, Estherion, Luther-X, Anubi ... and ... Alpha71
a couple of new spells
more wearable items (belts, singlets, shorts, chokers etc.)
bug fixes and optimizations

*they can become followers via console commands and EFF (or similar)

Optional: Schlongs of Skyrim (for No Underwear or All Naked Version)

This update is a standalone mod. You don't need anything else (all armors/clothes, different followers bodies etc) and they look as in screenshot (Different ENB a oart). :D

[center][size=5]Please Note: [/size][/center]
[center]This mod covers the [u][b]Male Human Races Only.[/b][/u]
Humanoid and/or beast bodies are not tested. Maybe can have some issues...

...isn't balanced, if you expect accurate settings for combat or anything else, this mod is not for you. :) 
I'm "developping" (big word)  the Gfx side of the mod the other things were put (in some cases) randomly...[/center]
[center]...is optimized to work with SOS, (not mandatory but better with it)...

...the wearable items are setted for SOS default bodies with weight 100.[/center]
[color=#ffe599]Installation:[/color]
[u][b]IMPORTANT:[/b][/u] In some cases to see changes in the current game you need to disable/enable followers by console commands or more simply  make a clean save to reset the mod.

NMM: Click No and Yes to All
Normal: Copy in data/ and enable the .esp in data files.

[font=Trebuchet MS]Updating:
if manually installed V2.10 update, please search and delete in data/ all folders named [u]T71PF[/u] and [u]personalfollower[/u] before install V3.00 overwriting the files if asked.
[/font]
NMM: Uninstall previous (V2.10 update and V2.08) and isntall V3.00 as usually /No and Yes to All).

I hope You like it. I made it just for fun, nothing serious. XD
and remember ^_^ ....more endorsments ...more variety XD

Have Fun!

[center][size=5]
[/size][/center]

PS: Upload your screenshots for a .... Fashion Gallery XD[/font]
author: Tiranno71

Corrected some syntax errors
Removed some items from Kunta Kinte (better without) and fixed skin mismatch
Double clothes removed from followers inventory
Added 4 spells: Candle Light & Mage Light 10 and 30 minutes
